<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105892</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105892</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202561</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cut and Paste Paragraphs: Editing Paragraphs on the Computer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnitt-und Paste Paragraphen: Bearbeiten von
von Paragraphen auf dem Computer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paragraphes de découpage et de déplacement : 
Édition des paragraphes sur l'ordinateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parágrafos do corte e da pasta: Editando 
parágrafos no computador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paragrafi della colla e del taglio: Stampa 
dei paragrafi sul calcolatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγραφοι cut-$l*and-$l*paste: Να επιμεληθεί 
παράγραφοι στον υπολογιστή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Párrafos de corte y de la goma: Corregir 
párrafos en el ordenador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students use the cut and paste commands of any word processing program to rearrange sentences in three different paragraphs, according to chronological order, spatial order, and order of importance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer verwenden die Schnitt- und 
Pastenbefehle jedes möglichen Textverarbeitung Programms, 
Programmsätze in drei unterschiedlichen Paragraphen, entsprechend 
chronologischer Ordnung umzuordnen, in der räumlichen Ordnung und in 
der Ordnung des Wertes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants utilisent les commandes de 
découpage et de déplacement de n'importe quel programme de 
traitement de texte de réarranger des phrases dans trois paragraphes 
différents, selon la commande chronologique, commande spatiale, et 
commande d'importance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes usam os comandos do corte e da pasta
de todo o programa processar de palavra rearranjar sentenças em três
parágrafos diferentes, de acordo com a ordem cronológica, na ordem 
spatial, e na ordem da importância.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi usano i comandi della colla e del 
taglio di tutto il programma di elaborazione di testi riorganizzare le
frasi per tre paragrafi differenti, secondo ordine cronologico, 
l'ordine spaziale e l'importanza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές χρησιμοποιούν τις εντολές 
cut-$l*and-$l*paste οποιουδήποτε προγράμματος επεξεργασίας 
κειμένου για να ρυθμιστούν εκ νέου οι προτάσεις κατά τρεις 
διαφορετικές παραγράφους, σύμφωνα με τη χρονολογική σειρά, 
χωρική κατάταξη, και σειρά σπουδαιότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes utilizan los comandos de corte y 
de la goma de cualquier programa del tratamiento de textos de textos 
de cambiar sentencias en tres diversos párrafos, según orden 
cronológica, orden espacial, y la orden de la importancia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
